turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you mind making a Starbucks run for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Which Starbucks should I orderfrom?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about the one on Forsyth Road, by Kroger?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great! What do you want from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! What if they're out of coconut milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done! Any extra flavors or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream, thanks. I want this to be dairy free.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Is there anything else you want from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks! Just a grande coconut vanilla latte, with a double shot of espresso and no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! I've confirmed your grande coconut milk vanilla latte with a double shot of espresso and no whipped cream with the Forsyth Road Starbucks, and it should be available for pickup in 5 minutes. The receipt should show up in your text messages momentarily.
